title: Woman ‘overwhelmed’ by loneliness killed herself and disabled daughter, coroner says
description: Full-time carer Martina Karos and Eleni Edwards, eight, were found dead at home in Salford
content:
A translator who became a full-time carer for her severely disabled eight-year-old daughter killed herself and her child after becoming “overwhelmed” by loneliness, a coroner concluded.
Martina Karos, 40, and Eleni Edwards were found dead at their ho... [2723 chars]

title: Prostate drug, abiraterone, to be offered to thousands in England
description: Abiraterone will be available in a matter of weeks and will be offered to 7,000 men a year.
content:
A life-extending prostate cancer drug is to be made available to thousands of men in England in a matter of weeks, after a campaign by a patient and a charity.
Abiraterone has been provided on the NHS in Scotland and Wales since 2023 but not in Engla... [5421 chars]

title: Amazon workers at Coventry warehouse tested for tuberculosis after outbreak
description: Company says TB testing carried out as ‘precaution’ after small number of workers contracted lung disease
content:
Amazon is testing workers at its Coventry warehouse for tuberculosis after an outbreak of the lung disease.
A handful of workers from the site were found to have contagious tuberculosis (TB) last year, prompting the UK Health Security Agency (UKHSA) ... [2988 chars]

title: Hamilton's Ferrari race engineer moved to new role
description: Lewis Hamilton's race engineer from the 2025 Formula 1 season has been moved to a new role inside Ferrari.
content:
Lewis Hamilton's race engineer from the 2025 Formula 1 season has been moved to a new role at Ferrari.
Riccardo Adami will take over as manager of the Ferrari driver academy and their programme for testing previous cars.
A Ferrari statement made no r... [2712 chars]

title: Former councillor jailed for stalking former MP Penny Mordaunt
description: Edward Brandt sentenced to 20 weeks in prison after behaviour left former minister ‘in fear of sexual violence’
content:
A former councillor has been jailed for 20 weeks after stalking Penny Mordaunt, which the former cabinet minister said left her fearing “sexual violence”.
